short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remotely ensures smooth presentations on Google Slides, letting all presenters change slides without using extra devices or apps.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Remotely ensures smooth presentations on Google Slides, allowing all presenters to change slides without needing additional devices or apps. Never again will you have to ask, "Can you move to the next slide, please?"

Invite all collaborators to the presentation with a code, enabling colleagues to join and control the deck themselves. This way, you no longer need to rely on one person to change slides. Remotely allows everyone to manage the presentation directly in their browser, eliminating the need for phones or additional apps.
